name: Mariena
description: Mariena is a survival horror game crafted with RPG MAKER. You'll play as a young boy who struggles to fall asleep while being haunted by a terrifying ballerina doll. Unravel the mystery behind the boy's haunting experiences and uncover the secrets that led him to this nightmarish situation. Is his sister somehow involved? Only by playing the game can you uncover the truth. Are you ready to face your fears and venture into the dark world of Mariena?
